definitions.text: the act of pursuing in an effort to overtake or capture
examples: the culprit started to run and the cop took off in pursuit

definitions.text: a search for an alternative that meets cognitive criteria
examples: life is more than the pursuance of fame

definitions.text: a diversion that occupies one's time and thoughts (usually pleasantly)
examples: he counts reading among his interests
they criticized the boy for his limited pursuits
